name: Hot Toddy
description: The Hot Toddy, with its warming blend of spices and sweet honey aroma is the perfect comforter and will soothe any aches, pains or winter sniffles.

name: Hot Tea Toddy
description: A variation on the classic Hot Toddy, this comforting drink is especially good if you think you are coming down with a cold. The recipe below makes enough for 2 cups - a drink is best when shared!
